title: Minister claims 'sabotage' behind Chagos debate delay
full_text: Minister claims 'sabotage' behind Chagos debate delay. The Conservatives have raised further concerns after Donald Trump described the agreement as a "great act of stupidity".. Richard WheelerPolitical reporter The UK government said it "remains confident" a deal to give the Chagos Islands to Mauritius is the "best way forward", despite criticism from US President Donald T… [+4235 chars]
